## Buffer.bind() method

Binds the buffer to a target binding point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bind(target?: BufferBindingPoint): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | [BufferBindingPoint](./webgl.bufferbindingpoint.md) | The binding point to bind to. If undefined, the target defined at instancing is used. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the buffer has successfully been bound, `false` otherwise.
